metadata.Title: CVE-2022-25299 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: This affects the package cesanta/mongoose before 7.6. The unsafe handling of file names during upload using mg_http_upload() method may enable attackers to write files to arbitrary locations outside the designated target folder.

criterions.comment: phantomjs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
